name: Sports Car Challenge
description:
[ NEW SPORTS CAR AVAILABLE: Prepare yourself for an uncompromising roadster that merges elegant design, high-end performance and trend-setting innovation. Add the Porsche Boxster S to your exclusive fleet of cars and find out what it is like to feel the airflow on your skin when you speed along the asphalt with more than 170mph. ]

Sports Car Challenge is a fast-paced racing experience for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch with graphics and gameplay never seen before on a smartphone or tablet. Enjoy the sheer beauty and amazing details of the hottest high-end sportscars from Audi, Bentley, Bugatti, Lamborghini, Porsche and Volkswagen, while you speed along the track with up to 250 miles per hour.

- Audi RS 5 Coupé
- Audi R8 GT Spyder
- Audi TTS Coupé
- Bentley Continental GT V8
- Bentley Continental Supersports ISR
- Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport
- Lamborghini Aventador LP 700-4
- Lamborghini Gallardo LP 570-4 Spyder Performante Edizione Tecnica
- Lamborghini Gallardo LP 570-4 Superleggera
- Porsche Boxster S
- Porsche 911 Carrera S
- Porsche Cayman R
- Volkswagen Scirocco R

Shift through the seven gears of the Bugatti Veyron 16.4 Grand Sport and indulge in the stunning looks of the Bentley Continental GT V8 or Bentley Continental Convertible ISR. Set new track records with the Lamborghini Aventador LP 700-4 or Lamborghini Gallardo LP 570-4 Superleggera and manoeuvre the Audi R8 GT Spyder or Audi TTS Coupé through the demanding slalom course. Master the challenging braking contest with the Porsche 911 Carrera S or the Porsche Cayman R and kick the pedal of the Volkswagen Scirocco R to the metal. Show your friends that you can beat their personal high scores at ease and dominate the global leaderboards!

- Time Trial
- Slalom
- Braking

With realistic driving physics, authentic engine sounds and manifold customization options on account of an exclusive selection of original rims and paintworks, Sports Car Challenge offers an unprecedented racing experience on iOS devices. And due to a number of free content-updates, which will add more cars and tracks to the title in the upcoming months, the challenge won’t be over anytime soon… do you have what it takes to master the hottest sports cars in the word and reach the finish line of five demanding circuits in minimum time?

- Black Forest Germany
- Shanghai Audi International Circuit
- Singapore by Night
- Yunlong Lake China
- Zhuhai International Circuit

Sports Car Challenge has been created and developed by FISHLABS Entertainment and is powered by the ABYSS game engine.
